* E-mail

Website

* Upload your CV

Artist Statement

Describe your overall artistic practice.(300 words max)

Proposal for Public Art Project

Briefly describe your proposed work for this project.(1000 words max)

(You may support your proposal with an image in the options below)

Based on your artistic discipline please send the following documents:

At most 10 images or 15 minutes of video or sound are required and should show your most recent work.

Caption/ description for each image is required (50 words max). Name each file in the following format: familyname-worksample#.jpg

Acceptable file type: jpg. Max Size: 2 MB (each image)

Applicants additionally have the option to submit up to 2 URLs where video, audio, or other formats can be accessed online.
